ingredients.item: 250g pack Waitrose Love Life Barley, Wheatberries, Spelt & Rice, or Love Life Quinoa, Chickpeas, Bulgur Wheat & Rice
2 roasted chicken breasts, skinned and diced
2 tbsp balsamic and olive oil dressing

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Place the sweet potato in a small roasting tin and toss in the oil. Roast for 15-20 minutes.
Heat the grains according to pack instructions, stir in the beetroot salad, chicken, dressing and sweet potato. Season and toss in the fresh chives.
